properties.name: sackbot.bot.adminRole
properties.description: Name of the Guild role to give SackBot admin access to.

properties.name: sackbot.bot.activity.type
properties.description: Activity type to show up as the bot status.

properties.name: sackbot.bot.activity.text
properties.description: Activity text to be used with the activity type.

properties.name: sackbot.bot.upload.sizeLimit
properties.description: Size limit of uploaded audio files.

properties.name: sackbot.bot.upload.overrideExisting
properties.description: If existing audio files should be overridden if a new one is uploaded with the same name.

properties.name: sackbot.nitrite.dbFile
properties.description: Path to database file. The database will be created if the file does not exist.
